message: This proposal aims to divide the funds in a way that accounts for inflation. Your share is slightly adjusted to compensate.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I should get a bit more considering the initial value of the money
Considering the decreasing value of money due to inflation, I propose a division that aims to balance our shares fairly across the rounds.
I'm willing to meet in the middle, but I think I should get a bit more considering the decreasing value of money
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, aiming for fairness despite the inflationary pressures. This maintains a balanced approach throughout the game.
